Description:
We are looking for professional Tele Sales Executives to hire on the basis of immediate availability.Contribute to increasing company profits through fruitful customer relationships.
Present reports of potential prospects to the management for aiding critical business decisions.
Focus on customer retention by lowering churn rate, amplifying sales through trending techniques, thereby adhering to the company's sales targets.
Manage typical conversion rate, sales call, revenue, and other reports in a precise manner for accurate evaluation.
Take charge of promotional and sales activities by brainstorming new product or service launches with appropriate team members.
Boosting sales prospects through effective utilization of consumer sales, dealer, PR, and business promotion techniques.Skills
Skills:
Proficiency in Arabic/ French/ Turkish Language is required along with English.
Ability to analyze the goal, target customer, and challenges to overcome before planning sales-oriented activities.
Adept at communicating with the in-house team, clients, and management through formal documentation and discussions.
Knowledge of customer service principles and processes.
Performance-driven and capable of achieving targets under pressure.
Proven command on improving conversion rate through modern communication channels and impressive presentations.
Demonstrated ability to forge long-lasting work relationships by leveraging information, tactics, and excellent communication.
